acme.util

Class Assert

  • java.lang.Object
    • acme.util.Assert

  • public class Assert
extends java.lang.Object
    Routines to assert conditions are true, to fail, and to panic. Panic is reserved for when the JVM will not be able to shutdown gracefully.
